forms.form: Rare. Only used with substantive adjectives.

words.etymology_text: Internationalism (see English ignorance), ultimately from Latin ignōrantia.
Internationalism (see English ignimbrite). Contains the suffix -iitti.

glosses: An iguana (any member of the genus Iguana).

categories: Finnish terms derived from Ancient Greek

words.etymology_text: Internationalism (see English igumen), ultimately from Ancient Greek ἡγούμενος (hēgoúmenos).
